column2: Determines if Dark/Half Elves will be seeded into a new world.\nRequires §YReligion/Culture Names§! set to §GHistorical§!.
The world will not be seeded with House Irae races.
There's a chance an independent ruler and their realm will be a Dark or Half Elf.
Humans are just a distant memory now.
If checked, Dark Elves and their religions and culture will appear during seeding.
If checked, Half Elves will appear during seeding.
